alert.note: Alert for Jo Daviess (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 01 at 2:40PM CDT until April 02 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 10 AM CDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. 1 to 2 inches of wet slushy snow possible on roadways. * WHERE...Portions of east central and northeast Iowa and northwest Illinois. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 10 AM CDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates up to one inch an hour are possible along and north of the Highway 20 corridor. This could lead to snow covered roads across those areas. Temperatures should warm enough in the late morning to melt any remaining snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 for Iowa, or by visiting 511ia.org, modot.org, or idot.Illinois.gov.
